properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 6:53AM EST until February 7 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South or southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to
30 kt from Thursday afternoon into Friday afternoon. Waves 3
to 4 ft expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
